kamit-founder-ceo-current.title: Founder & CEO
kamit-founder-ceo-current.description:
- Founded Kamit Digital Solutions to support African startups in their digital transformation.
- Provide tailored solutions adapted to client needs and budgets.
- Lead technical teams and oversee all development projects.
- Develop business strategies and manage client relationships.
- Accompany companies in their digital transformation journey.

kamit-fullstack-dev-current.title: FullStack Developer
kamit-fullstack-dev-current.description:
- Develop professional websites and business software solutions.
- Create modern web applications using latest technologies.
- Implement responsive UI/UX designs for optimal user experience.
- Integrate APIs and build scalable backend systems.
- Ensure code quality and maintain high development standards.

prosen-responsable-informatique.title: IT Manager
prosen-responsable-informatique.description:
- Development and management of the company's web platform.
- Design and implementation of software solutions tailored to Prosen's needs.
- Supervision of data management and information systems.
- Implementation of IT security solutions to ensure data confidentiality.
- Training teams on digital tools usage and technology management.

linfluent-cofounder-fullstack.title: Co-founder & Full Stack Developer
linfluent-cofounder-fullstack.description:
- Design and maintain interactive web applications using modern frameworks like Nuxt.js, Vue.js, React and Next.js.
- Manage client relationships to ensure satisfaction and delivery of high-quality projects.
- Implement customized solutions aimed at optimizing digital engagement for partner companies.

kinsiba-dev-benevolat.title: Volunteer Developer & Graphic Designer
kinsiba-dev-benevolat.description:
- Development of the association's website.
- Creation of a patient management application.
- Design of a mobile application for activity tracking.
- Creation of graphic materials for printing.

vie-publique-dev-benevolat.title: Volunteer Web Developer
vie-publique-dev-benevolat.description:
- Design and development of the citizen platform.
- Participation in improving accessibility and transparency of public information.
- Contribution to open source and community collaboration.

carre-dor-consultant-digital.title: Digital Consultant Manager
carre-dor-consultant-digital.description:
- Creation of an application dedicated to real estate management and customer relationship management.
- Creation of a complete website, taking into account UI/UX, to offer an optimal user experience.
- Design of the brand logo and development of a graphic charter to ensure the visual consistency of the company.
- Creation of business cards, flyers, brochures, banners, door plates and other visual materials to promote the company.
- Management of digital strategy and development of the brand's online presence.

vigilus-chef-projet-digital.title: Digital Project Manager
vigilus-chef-projet-digital.description:
- Development of digital solutions for the company.
- Management of online presence and content creation for advertising campaigns.
- Implementation of digital marketing strategies to optimize user engagement.
- Performance monitoring and analysis of campaign results.
